intro: Bacularia, commonly known as the sacred lotus, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Asia. It belongs to the Nelumbonaceae family and is characterized by its large, showy flowers and heart-shaped leaves. Bacularia has been culturally and spiritually significant in various Asian traditions for centuries.
